long_description: Expand your travel options with the Eagle Creek 2-in-1 Backpack Duffel. Stuff it full of clothes and gear in duffel mode for your journey, then convert it to a daypack for exploring your destination. This innovative, ultralight bag is made from highly durable and water-resistant silnylon (nylon impregnated with silicone). Gains 5 liters of capacity when it unzips and converts from a 28-liter daypack to a 33-liter duffel. Adjustable mesh shoulder straps zip away in the back panel when not needed. Color-coded webbing loops and clips make it easy to connect the pack straps. External zippered pocket holds items you want kept handy. 2 side stretch-mesh pockets hold a water bottle in daypack mode or other items in duffel mode. Main compartment has finger-friendly zipper pulls that can take a lock (sold separately). Side and bottom compression straps stabilize the load; lots of lash points let you clip on gear. Eagle Creek 2-in-1 Backpack Duffel has reflective accents for low-light visibility. Included carry/storage pouch can double as an internal security pocket. Washable.
short_description: Expand your travel options with the Eagle Creek 2-in-1 Backpack Duffel. Stuff it full of clothes and gear in duffel mode for your journey, then convert it to a daypack for exploring your destination.
